intro.title: A gift from nature,
intro.text: Kava (Piper methysticum) is more than just a plant. For millennia, it has been the social and spiritual center of Pacific island cultures. Today, modern science confirms what islanders have always known: Kava relaxes the body and clears the mind without impairing cognitive abilities.
intro.quote: Kava is the only botanical substance with Level-1 evidence for the treatment of anxiety disorders.

features.title: Safety
features.text: Current research debunks old myths about liver toxicity with proper use.
